name: Aries (itch) (Bryn Higgins)
description:
Aries is a fire spirit-keeper. Fire Sprites have escaped from their spirit stone and Aries must return them to avoid the chaotic spirits causing havoc.

Short point-and-click adventure game, mouse input only.

All original artwork and visuals. Solo Project - Bryn Higgins

This was created as my first game development project during my first year in University. Tasked with creating an interactive 2D experience. Designed in the style of a point-and-click game, utilizing only the mouse for input, creating a small narrative experience for the player to explore and engage with.
